svg.text: Neural Network Analysis of Conflict Dynamics
Graph representation of how different conflict
drivers interact and reinforce each other
Identification of critical thresholds where conflict
systems can shift toward peace or violence
How conflict dynamics typically evolve over time
This visualization is based on data from conflict databases including UCDP, ACLED, and World Bank Fragility indicators, with uncertainty represented through
connection opacity. All analyses undergo expert review and ground-truth validation with practitioners from conflict-affected contexts.
